sorcer.core.exertion

Class NetTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.service.ServiceExertion
      • sorcer.service.Task
        • sorcer.core.exertion.ObjectTask
          • sorcer.core.exertion.NetTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Evaluation<Object>, Exec, Exertion, Identifiable, Invocation<Object>, Mappable, Revaluation, Service
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SignedServiceTask

    public class NetTask
extends ObjectTask
implements Evaluation<Object>, Invocation<Object>
    The SORCER service task extending the abstract task Task.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
